description:
Farm Steam trading cards, manage achievements, and idle games automatically â€” an all-in-one alternative to ArchiSteamFarm, Steam Achievement Manager, and Idle Master

Steam Game Idler (SGI) is a Steam automation tool for farming trading cards, managing achievements, and boosting playtime across all games in your Steam library.
